授業目的:
The main objective is to improve the students' ability to discuss educational issues in English.
The secondary objective is to improve their active vocabulary.
到達目標: By the end of the course, students should be able to discuss, give their opinions on and present on the issues raised in the course.
授業方法:
We will normally begin each class with warmup questions about recent events and the weather. There will be ample opportunity for pair and group work.
Face-to-face lessons. Zoom format will begin on April 28.
